Product Description

THE MORE FUN

THE BETTER

Cool Game Sets for Outdoor Activities： While enjoying the fresh air, playing the ball catch game in backyard, park or on the lawn will be a very pleasant experience. Top Gift Idea: It will be a perfect idea to give away the toss and catch ball game set as a gift for Easter and birthday.More Interaction: To play the sport games at least 2 persons are required. So it will be a good chance for socialization and interaction among friends.Family Pack: 4 Pop-launcher Baskets and 6 balls, your whole family members can join the family games. You will enjoy the toss and catch ball game and love sports more than ever.

Mission and Vision of Duckura

Duckura are committed to the production and sales of toys for many years, and have been adhering to the provision of better quality, more creative, educational toys, and better service. Make kids learning in playing. Encourage parent and kids play outdoor and become friends.

Great sports and super fun!

Do you love sports and anything that involves throwing and grabbing a ball? Are your kids crazy about ball catching games?

If the answer to those questions is yes, then you should try these sport toys. We have designed the ball catching game that will offer you endless hours of ball throwing and catching.

PACKING LIST

Pop-launcher Baskets x 4 (2 Blue & 2 Green) Balls x 6 (3 Green + 3 Red) Colorful Storage Box x 1

High Premium and Safe Material

The launcher baskets and balls are made from high-quality ABS plastic. You will never worry about your kids getting hurt.

Educational Sports for Kids

This catch ball set will help your kids develop fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, problem-solving, spatial and communication skills!

Activities for Indoor & Outdoor

Our catch ball games can be played both indoor and outdoor.Very easy to take apart and assemble, convenient for taking to vacations, picnics, tailgating, camping, birthday parties and more!

Carnival Toss Games

Great Toy Set for Kids

【TOSS N’ CATCH GAMES】Are you boring during the holidays with family? This toss and catch ball sets are suit for you. Whatever backyard, lawn, camping, beach, pool or indoor, you can play with them anywhere you want.
【EASY To PLAY】Hold the ball holder basket in your hands, press the trigger to launch the ball and another one use basket to catch it. Let’s start the throwing and catching ball races with friends.
【ADULTS & KIDS ACTIVE】These sports games are good ideal for both kids and adults, whatever different skill levels. Suitable to indoor or outdoor activities with family.
【DEVELOP FINE MOTOR SKILLS】Besides being fun, this sport toys can help your kids collaborate and interact with other kids more easily. Help them develop fine motor skills and increase social skills.
【PACKAGE INCLUDE】Package will Comes with 4 launchers(2-blue and 2-green), 6 ping-pong balls(2 color random) and Exquisite Color box.(Great for Gifts).

THE MORE FUN

THE BETTER

From the brand

NISEALYT Store

Put our cute stickers in the Christmas stockings as surprise gifts for kids, teens, adults.

About NISEALYT

NISEALYT is a manufacturer of toys for children, teens and adults.

Since its birth, NISEALYT has been committed to bringing people high-quality and inexpensive products, which can stimulate children’s aesthetic ability and practical ability.

We have excellent designers and professional printing machines, the products are beautiful, practical, novel design trend, colorful and rich, vinyl material, safe, waterproof and non-toxic.

Cute Stickers

Christmas Gifts

Party Favors

Room Decor

300 Pcs Sports mixed stickers (including 50pcs american football,50pcs volleyball,50pcs baseball,50pcs basketball,50pcs soccer,50pcs ice hockey style). Zero duplication and large quantity designs suitable for sharing with friends,classmates,family.
Cute sports stickers are absolutely perfect for children,teens and adults who are fanatical with outdoor exercise & health life.Funny back to school supplies for incentives and rewards for students,also can be the family prizes which your kids must love them.
Super cool sports stickers pack for Christmas stocking stuffers and party favors, birthday and holiday surprise gifts. They are perfect for Merry Christmas decorations such as DIY the cards, envelope, candies bags, goodies bags, cupcake and home decor.
Stickers sizes ranging from 1.5 to 3 inches,well used for any DIY craft projects like water bottles,mugs,laptop,notebook,phone case,scrapbook,journal,folders,skateboard,luggage,guitar,helmet,bumper,bike,motor,car,locker,door,desk,fridge and room decor.
Waterproof vinyl stickers are made of clear and delicate patterns printed in HD,with strong glue that is safe,non-toxic.Easy to tear off the back paper and can be used repeatedly,will not shrink off and does not leave any residue.Overall thick & durable.

300 Pcs Sports Theme Stickers,varity of american football, volleyball, baseball, basketball, soccer and ice hockey designs for choose no matter what kind of fan you are. Waterproof,clear and delicate patterns,easy to tear off the back paper and can be used repeatedly,will not shrink off and does not leave any residue,thick & durable.Believe us! Believe NISEALYT!

Using your imagination,creativity and hands-on ability to decorate your items with colorful stickers to make life full of vitality.

Q&A

1.

Q:The stickers come separated or in a sheet,whether each exercise type is individually packaged or all mixed?

A:They are not in sheets,each is individual.Easy to separate every sport because they are packed in individual small bags,50pcs for each style.

2.

Q:Will I get all kinds of stickers in the main picture?No random delivery?

A:Sure everyone will get all of them shown in the main picture of the product,including 6 style sports.
